org.jacorb.orb

Class RTORB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.omg.CORBA.LocalObject
      • org.omg.RTCORBA._RTORBLocalBase
        • org.jacorb.orb.RTORB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, LocalInterface, Object, IDLEntity, org.omg.RTCORBA.RTORB, org.omg.RTCORBA.RTORBOperations

    public final class RTORB
extends org.omg.RTCORBA._RTORBLocalBase
    The RTORB class, a partial implementation of org.omg.RTCORBA.RTORB Currently only used for the creation of ETF related policies.
    Author:
    Steve Osselton
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
